about.text: A vivacious and energetic individual with a flair for the dramatic, Harleen Quinzell is looking to bring her unique brand of enthusiasm to the world of early childhood education. With a background in psychology and a passion for laughter, she's ready to make learning an adventure for every little pudding in her classroom.

items.text: Hey there, kiddos and grown-ups! I'm [Harleen Quinzell](https://funhouseeducation.com/harleen), and I'm all about turning frowns upside down. After an exciting career journey full of twists and turns (some might say cartwheels), I've decided it's time to share my zest for life with the next generation. Let's face it, education could use a little more color and a lot more confetti!
items.title: Time for Some Fun!

items.text: I've had the pleasure of working with a variety of interesting characters and organizations, including stints at [Giggles and Gags Entertainment](https://gigglesandgags.com) and volunteering at [The Funhouse Community Center](https://funhousecc.org). My unconventional experiences have taught me that the best way to engage young minds is through creativity, spontaneity, and maybe a sprinkle of glitter.
items.title: An Unconventional Journey

items.text: With a background in psychology (yes, I have a doctorate—surprised?), I understand the importance of nurturing a child's mind and the power of positive reinforcement. I also have a knack for turning everyday lessons into unforgettable adventures. Who says learning the alphabet can't involve a scavenger hunt and some pet hyenas? Just kidding about the hyenas... unless that's allowed!
items.title: Education Meets Excitement

items.text: I'm eager to join a team that values out-of-the-box thinking and isn't afraid of a little chaos—in the most constructive sense, of course! If you're looking for a teacher who can bring joy, laughter, and maybe the occasional whoopee cushion to the classroom, look no further.
items.title: Ready to Join the Fun Squad!

items.text:
So, if you're ready to add a splash of excitement to your educational institution, let's chat! You can reach me at [harleen@funhouseeducation.com](mailto:harleen@funhouseeducation.com). Can't wait to create a world where learning is the greatest adventure of all!

Cheers and giggles,
Harleen
items.title: Let's Connect (No Joy Buzzer Handshake, Promise!)

identity.name: Harleen Quinzell
identity.tagline: Turning classrooms into wonderlands of learning and laughter.

items.title: Joyful Jumpstart Program
items.description: Developed a program that integrates play and laughter into foundational learning, enhancing engagement and retention among preschoolers.

items.title: Carnival of Learning
items.description: Organized a community event that transformed educational booths into carnival games, making learning accessible and enjoyable for families.

items.title: Harleen's Hijinks Blog
items.description: A blog sharing tips, tricks, and tales from the wild world of education, with a focus on keeping things light-hearted and engaging.
Performed interactive shows for children, incorporating educational elements into entertainment. Known for high energy and unforgettable performances.
Managed volunteer activities and created programs aimed at engaging youth in community service through fun and innovative methods.
Provided entertainment services for children's parties, including magic tricks, face painting, and interactive games that delighted audiences of all ages.
Assisted with patient care and therapeutic activities, gaining insight into various psychological conditions and therapeutic techniques.
Performed acrobatics and clown acts, developing a strong foundation in physical coordination and audience engagement.
